arts.ttl: Stoke City vs Norwich City: EFL Championship Preview, Gameweek 7, 2025/26
arts.sum: Recent performances, including a shock Carabao Cup exit to early Sky Bet League One pacesetters Bradford City, have hinted that their impressive start may begin to tail off in the coming weeks, but Mark Robins’ side still look well on course to post a much-improved league finish, at the very least, after years of stagnation. Elsewhere, forward Sam Gallagher is hoping to be fit enough to make the bench for the very first time this season, having overcome the latest of his calf-related issues.
